long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of going on websites and never understanding how your data is being used? The No Jargon Chrome Extension is here for you! We simplify a company’s privacy policy into a few understandable main points and top it off with a rating out of 5 stars. If you still want to keep using the website you're on, you can look through simple step by step instructions on how to secure your privacy through provided settings. But if it’s time to ditch, we got you too, with a list of similar privacy focused alternatives.
